title: Bikewatching
description: This interactive map visualizes BlueBikes traffic patterns and bike lane infrastructure in Greater Boston using Mapbox GL and D3.js. Station markers scale based on total traffic, with colors indicating whether a station has more departures (blue) or arrivals (orange). A time slider filters trips by time of day, dynamically updating station activity. The map also overlays Boston and Cambridge bike lanes for context. Designed for urban planners, cyclists, and researchers, this tool helps analyze bike usage trends and supports better bike infrastructure planning.

title: Recipe and Rating
description: Having knowledge about the relationship between recipe attributes and ratings offers important insights into how nutrition and food preferences relate. In order to investigate the calorie content of recipes, identify the critical factors influencing calories, and investigate if calorie count affects user ratings, we analyze a dataset of recipes and ratings.

title: Movie Recommendation System
description: Using collaborative filtering and sentiment analysis, this project aims to create a recommendation system that predicts user preferences for movies based on previous ratings and reviews.

title: Stock Price Predictor
description: This project applies machine learning models to predict stock price movements based on historical data, news sentiment, and market trends.

title: E-commerce Sales Analysis
description: By analyzing e-commerce transaction data, this project identifies purchasing trends, customer behavior, and key factors influencing online sales performance.

title: Fake News Detection
description: A natural language processing (NLP) approach to detecting fake news articles using classification algorithms and linguistic analysis.

title: Health Risk Prediction
description: Utilizing patient data, this project predicts potential health risks such as diabetes or heart disease using statistical models and machine learning.

title: Customer Churn Prediction
description: By analyzing customer interactions, this project identifies patterns that indicate whether a customer is likely to stop using a service.

title: Air Quality Monitoring
description: A real-time data visualization project that monitors air pollution levels and predicts future air quality trends using sensor data.

title: Social Media Sentiment Analysis
description: Using NLP techniques, this project analyzes social media posts to determine public sentiment on various topics, brands, or trends.

title: Music Genre Classification
description: Applying deep learning techniques to classify music tracks into different genres based on their audio features.

title: Traffic Flow Prediction
description: Using machine learning and real-time traffic data, this project forecasts traffic congestion patterns to improve urban planning and reduce delays.

title: Personalized Learning Platform
description: An AI-driven platform that adapts learning materials based on student performance and engagement, providing a personalized educational experience.
